query:
INSERT INTO hotels (name, nameEn, city, country, address, latitude, longitude, starRating, reviewScore, reviewCount, imageUrl, amenities, description, descriptionEn, policyText, policyTextEn) VALUES
('东京帝国酒店', 'Imperial Hotel Tokyo', 'Tokyo', 'Japan', '1-1-1 Uchisaiwaicho, Chiyoda-ku, Tokyo', 35.6722, 139.7577, 5, 9.2, 2847, 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1566073771259-6a8506099945?w=800', '["WiFi", "Pool", "Spa", "Restaurant", "Gym", "Concierge"]', '东京帝国酒店是日本最负盛名的酒店之一，位于东京市中心，毗邻皇居。', 'The Imperial Hotel Tokyo is one of Japan most prestigious hotels, located in central Tokyo near the Imperial Palace.', 'Cancellation Policy: Free cancellation until 24 hours before check-in. After that, the first night will be charged. No-show will result in full charge. Check-in time: 3:00 PM. Check-out time: 12:00 PM. Early check-in and late check-out are subject to availability and may incur additional charges. Tax Information: A 10% consumption tax and a Tokyo accommodation tax (ranging from 100-200 JPY per night depending on room rate) will be added to the room rate. Service charge of 10% applies to all services. ID Requirements: All guests must present a valid passport or government-issued ID at check-in. International guests must provide passport information for registration purposes as required by Japanese law. Deposit: A credit card authorization or cash deposit of 50,000 JPY is required at check-in for incidentals.', 'Cancellation Policy: Free cancellation until 24 hours before check-in. After that, the first night will be charged. No-show will result in full charge. Check-in time: 3:00 PM. Check-out time: 12:00 PM. Early check-in and late check-out are subject to availability and may incur additional charges. Tax Information: A 10% consumption tax and a Tokyo accommodation tax (ranging from 100-200 JPY per night depending on room rate) will be added to the room rate. Service charge of 10% applies to all services. ID Requirements: All guests must present a valid passport or government-issued ID at check-in. International guests must provide passport information for registration purposes as required by Japanese law. Deposit: A credit card authorization or cash deposit of 50,000 JPY is required at check-in for incidentals.'),
('新加坡滨海湾金沙酒店', 'Marina Bay Sands Singapore', 'Singapore', 'Singapore', '10 Bayfront Avenue, Singapore', 1.2834, 103.8607, 5, 9.0, 5621, 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1520250497591-112f2f40a3f4?w=800', '["WiFi", "Infinity Pool", "Casino", "Spa", "Restaurant", "Sky Park"]', '新加坡滨海湾金沙是世界著名的综合度假村，拥有标志性的空中花园和无边泳池。', 'Marina Bay Sands is a world-famous integrated resort featuring the iconic SkyPark and infinity pool.', 'Cancellation Policy: Cancellations made 72 hours prior to arrival will receive full refund. Cancellations within 72 hours will be charged one night room rate. No-show will be charged full stay amount. Check-in: 3:00 PM, Check-out: 11:00 AM. Tax Information: 10% service charge and 7% GST (Goods and Services Tax) will be added. Tourism tax of SGD 10 per room per night applies. ID Requirements: Valid passport required for all international guests. Singapore residents must present NRIC. Deposit: Credit card pre-authorization of SGD 200 per night required.', 'Cancellation Policy: Cancellations made 72 hours prior to arrival will receive full refund. Cancellations within 72 hours will be charged one night room rate. No-show will be charged full stay amount. Check-in: 3:00 PM, Check-out: 11:00 AM. Tax Information: 10% service charge and 7% GST (Goods and Services Tax) will be added. Tourism tax of SGD 10 per room per night applies. ID Requirements: Valid passport required for all international guests. Singapore residents must present NRIC. Deposit: Credit card pre-authorization of SGD 200 per night required.'),
('巴黎丽兹酒店', 'Ritz Paris', 'Paris', 'France', '15 Place Vendôme, 75001 Paris', 48.8683, 2.3290, 5, 9.5, 1893, 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1551882547-ff40c63fe5fa?w=800', '["WiFi", "Spa", "Restaurant", "Bar", "Concierge", "Valet Parking"]', '巴黎丽兹酒店是世界上最著名的奢华酒店之一，位于旺多姆广场。', 'The Ritz Paris is one of the most famous luxury hotels in the world, located on Place Vendôme.', 'Cancellation Policy: Free cancellation up to 7 days before arrival. Cancellations within 7 days will be charged 50% of total stay. Cancellations within 48 hours or no-show will be charged 100%. Check-in: 3:00 PM, Check-out: 12:00 PM. Tax Information: French VAT of 10% is included in room rates. City tax (taxe de séjour) of €5 per person per night applies. ID Requirements: Valid passport or EU ID card required at check-in. Deposit: Full payment or credit card guarantee required at booking.', 'Cancellation Policy: Free cancellation up to 7 days before arrival. Cancellations within 7 days will be charged 50% of total stay. Cancellations within 48 hours or no-show will be charged 100%. Check-in: 3:00 PM, Check-out: 12:00 PM. Tax Information: French VAT of 10% is included in room rates. City tax (taxe de séjour) of €5 per person per night applies. ID Requirements: Valid passport or EU ID card required at check-in. Deposit: Full payment or credit card guarantee required at booking.'),
('纽约华尔道夫酒店', 'Waldorf Astoria New York', 'New York', 'USA', '301 Park Avenue, New York, NY 10022', 40.7565, -73.9725, 5, 8.9, 3456, 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1564501049412-61c2a3083791?w=800', '["WiFi", "Spa", "Restaurant", "Bar", "Gym", "Business Center"]', '纽约华尔道夫酒店是美国最具标志性的豪华酒店之一，位于曼哈顿中城。', 'The Waldorf Astoria New York is one of America most iconic luxury hotels, located in Midtown Manhattan.', 'Cancellation Policy: Free cancellation until 48 hours before check-in. Late cancellation or no-show will be charged first night. Check-in: 4:00 PM, Check-out: 11:00 AM. Tax Information: New York State sales tax (8.875%), NYC hotel occupancy tax (5.875%), and $2 per room per night city fee apply. Total tax approximately 14.75% plus fees. ID Requirements: Government-issued photo ID required. International guests must present passport. Deposit: Credit card required at booking. Authorization for incidentals at check-in.', 'Cancellation Policy: Free cancellation until 48 hours before check-in. Late cancellation or no-show will be charged first night. Check-in: 4:00 PM, Check-out: 11:00 AM. Tax Information: New York State sales tax (8.875%), NYC hotel occupancy tax (5.875%), and $2 per room per night city fee apply. Total tax approximately 14.75% plus fees. ID Requirements: Government-issued photo ID required. International guests must present passport. Deposit: Credit card required at booking. Authorization for incidentals at check-in.'),
('迪拜帆船酒店', 'Burj Al Arab Dubai', 'Dubai', 'UAE', 'Jumeirah Beach Road, Dubai', 25.1412, 55.1853, 5, 9.4, 2134, 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1582719508461-905c673771fd?w=800', '["WiFi", "Private Beach", "Spa", "Restaurant", "Helipad", "Butler Service"]', '迪拜帆船酒店是世界上最奢华的酒店之一，以其独特的帆船造型闻名。', 'Burj Al Arab is one of the most luxurious hotels in the world, famous for its distinctive sail-shaped silhouette.', 'Cancellation Policy: Non-refundable rates available at discount. Flexible rates: free cancellation up to 14 days before arrival. Within 14 days: 50% charge. Within 7 days: 100% charge. Check-in: 3:00 PM, Check-out: 12:00 PM. Tax Information: 10% service charge, 10% municipality fee, and 5% VAT apply. Tourism Dirham fee of AED 20 per room per night. ID Requirements: Passport required for all guests. UAE residents must present Emirates ID. Deposit: Full prepayment required for all bookings.', 'Cancellation Policy: Non-refundable rates available at discount. Flexible rates: free cancellation up to 14 days before arrival. Within 14 days: 50% charge. Within 7 days: 100% charge. Check-in: 3:00 PM, Check-out: 12:00 PM. Tax Information: 10% service charge, 10% municipality fee, and 5% VAT apply. Tourism Dirham fee of AED 20 per room per night. ID Requirements: Passport required for all guests. UAE residents must present Emirates ID. Deposit: Full prepayment required for all bookings.'),
('香港半岛酒店', 'The Peninsula Hong Kong', 'Hong Kong', 'China', 'Salisbury Road, Kowloon, Hong Kong', 22.2950, 114.1722, 5, 9.3, 2567, 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1542314831-068cd1dbfeeb?w=800', '["WiFi", "Pool", "Spa", "Restaurant", "Rolls-Royce Fleet", "Helipad"]', '香港半岛酒店是亚洲最著名的酒店之一，被誉为"远东贵妇"。', 'The Peninsula Hong Kong is one of Asia most famous hotels, known as the Grand Dame of the Far East.', 'Cancellation Policy: Free cancellation up to 72 hours before arrival. Cancellations within 72 hours will be charged one night. No-show charged full stay. Check-in: 2:00 PM, Check-out: 12:00 PM. Tax Information: 10% service charge applies. No additional government taxes on hotel accommodation in Hong Kong. ID Requirements: Valid passport or HKID required. Mainland China visitors must present valid travel permit. Deposit: Credit card authorization of HKD 2,000 per night for incidentals.', 'Cancellation Policy: Free cancellation up to 72 hours before arrival. Cancellations within 72 hours will be charged one night. No-show charged full stay. Check-in: 2:00 PM, Check-out: 12:00 PM. Tax Information: 10% service charge applies. No additional government taxes on hotel accommodation in Hong Kong. ID Requirements: Valid passport or HKID required. Mainland China visitors must present valid travel permit. Deposit: Credit card authorization of HKD 2,000 per night for incidentals.');
